column1: '''Bonfire Glade''' was a reminder of the strange 'war' that took place between the malevolent trees of the [[Old Forest]] and the [[Hobbits]] of [[Buckland]]
The trees attacked the [[High Hay|Hedge]] that protected the [[Bucklanders]]
column3: the [[Hobbits]] invaded the forest and burnt hundreds of trees in a huge bonfire. The Bonfire Glade was the place of that great burning
column5: the trees left it an open and empty place.

column3: and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] to the glade and out the other side on a path leading into the heart of the Old Forest.<ref>{{FR|I6}}</ref>
